; Mission is available even if you are not a pilgrim.
True
Events.OnAcceptedUndock:
; Called after the player undocks after having accepted the ; mission. ; ; gSource: Mission object. ; aDockTarget: Object that we were docked with.
(block ( (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msn@ gSource 'ownerID)))
pilgrimObj ) ; Create the pilgrim
(setq pilgrimObj (sysCreateEncounter &tbSisters03FallenPilgrims; { distance: (random 120 150) target: stationObj }))
; Make sure wreck survives
(objSet@ pilgrimObj 'alwaysLeaveWreck True)
; No friendly fire
(objSet@ stationObj 'ignoreFriendlyFire True)
; Register
(msnRegisterForEvents gSource pilgrimObj) (msnSet@ gSource 'targetID (objGetID pilgrimObj)) (msnSet@ gSource 'status 'combat) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
; Called to refresh the player's target. Always called right ; after the player accepts the mission. May be called at ; other times (e.g., after the player returns to the system). ; ; gSource: Mission object. ; aReason: ; 'accepted: Mission has been accepted ; 'debriefed: Player has been debriefed ; 'failure: Mission failed ; 'inProgress: Player visited station while mission in progress ; 'newSystem: Player is in a new system ; 'success: Mission completed successfully
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 'attack)
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
; Called when an object is destroyed, but only if we have ; called msnRegisterForEvents on the object. ; ; gSource: Mission object. ; aObjDestroyed: Object that was destroyed ; aDestroy: True if object was destroyed (as opposed to left ; system) ; aDestroyReason: ; 'ascended ; 'custom ; 'damage ; 'disintegration ; 'ejecta ; 'enteredStargate ; 'explosion ; 'gravity ; 'playerCreatedExplosion ; 'powerFailure ; 'radiationPoisoning ; 'removedFromSystem ; 'runningOutOfFuel ; 'self ; 'shatter ; 'weaponMalfunction ; aDestroyer: Object that destroyed it. ; aOrderGiver: Object that controlled destroyer, e.g., ; if destroyer is an auton. ; aWreckObj: Wreck left behind (may be nil)
(switch ; If our station got destroyed, then we fail.
(= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msn@ gSource 'ownerID)) (block () (msnSet@ gSource 'status 'sistersDestroyed) (msnFailure gSource) )
; If this is the fallen pilgrim, then we win
(= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msn@ gSource 'targetID)) (block () (if aDestroy (msnSet@ gSource 'status 'pilgrimDestroyed) (msnSet@ gSource 'status 'pilgrimLeft) )
; If the mission hasn't failed, and we destroyed the ; fallen pilgrim, then place treasure on the wreck.
(if (and aWreckObj (not (msn@ gSource 'isFailure)) ) (block () (objSetEventHandler aWreckObj &evSisters03Wreck;) (objAddRandomItems aWreckObj &tbSisters03PilgrimTreasure; 1) (objSet@ aWreckObj 'maxStructuralHP 500) (objSet@ aWreckObj 'structuralHP 500) ) )
; Mission always succeeds, even if pilgrim gates out
(msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.OnCompleted:
; Called when the mission ends (generally because msnSuccess ; or msnFailure were called). ; ; gSource: Mission object. ; gData: Arbitrary data passed in to msnSuccess or msnFailure ; aReason: ; 'failure: Mission failed ; 'success: Mission completed successfully
(block ( (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msn@ gSource 'ownerID))) ) (objSet@ stationObj 'ignoreFriendlyFire Nil) )

Language.Text: Confront Fallen Pilgrim

Your mission is to defend the Sisters from a fallen pilgrim.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

The abbess greets you:
"Welcome, pilgrim! I must burden you with a terrible task. Are you ready to fulfill Domina's will?"

The abbess examines your face for a second.
"Not all pilgrims are as resilient as you. Some strain under the immense pressure of their journey.
"Some break.
"One such pilgrim has returned. Her name is Anna Janko, and she has fallen from Domina's grace. Her thoughts are of violence and death."

"I don't know. Even Domina cannot straighten the crooked timber of humanity. We are imperfect beings, and imperfect beings fail.
"Anna Janko has the powers of Domina, but her mind is corrupted. She means to destroy us, and will do so easily, if she is not stopped."
Language.String: "[W]hat do you want me to do?"
Language.Text:
The abbess keeps her eyes on you, then looks away.
"I want you to kill her. Kill her before she kills us."

"Thank you! We are counting on you!
"Anna Janko is only a hundred light-seconds out. When she gets here, she'll try to kill us all.
"Only you can stop her!"
"You may do so, but there isn't much time. Please return as soon as you can. Don't abandon us!"
The abbess is in the sanctum praying. You cannot get her attention.

The abbess looks at you in awe.
"You're truly Domina's child! You have defended us without killing Anna Janko. Like all dark creatures, she has fled rather than face justice.
"But I worry that your conflict is only postponed."

The abbess is sad.
"Every life lost is a tragedy, but you saved many more today. Thank you."
LATER: We're all dead.
Mission complete!

You enter the wreckage and see the crumpled body of a woman. She looks up at you with a blank expression. Blood drips out of a wound on the back of her head. She coughs out a laugh.
"Domina's puppet! Have you reached the core yet?"

"Every day of your journey you become more like them. Like her. Cold. Unfeeling. Inhuman."
She grabs your arm.
"Hang on to your humanity! Renounce Domina and accept the truth!"

"We're the enemy! The pilgrims are being controlled by Domina to destroy humanity, and the Sisters are helping. By the time you reach the core you will have gained all the power of the Ancient Races.
"When you return, you'll be as powerful as a god. And Domina will use you to destroy us all!"

Anna Janko coughs out a spray of blood. Her head tilts down.
"Don't go," she whispers. "Don't go."
Her body goes limp.
